Data: Please note that human cells including cell lines are considered human bodily material according to the biobank law, registration with the UZL ethical committee is required, for more information and procedures see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanmaterial
Please clarify how you will share your data, in RDR or via email? You can also use a disciplinary repository to make your data available for others, eg EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/), for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
